description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has an ongoing need for speed-measuring equipment that is required to enforce vehicle speed regulations by delivering to RCMP Regional Detachments and Traffic Services units' located across Canada.
full_summary:
Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for Speed Measuring Equipment
================================--------

**Reference Number:** cb-769-33172611
**Amendment Number:** 7
**Solicitation Number:** 202400248-C
**Publication Date:** November 9, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 24, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Category:** Goods (4631 - Bar Code Readers and Detectors Price Group)
**UNSPSC Code:** 46171616, Radar Detectors (France: Détecteurs de radar)

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Procurement Overview:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking to acquire speed measuring equipment to enforce vehicle speed regulations across Canada. The contract is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Suppliers' right to submit a statement of capabilities is available, which must be submitted in writing to the contact person by November 24, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.

**Statement of Capabilities:**
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the required goods or services may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person by the closing date mentioned above. The statement must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

**Contact Information:**
Dan Caughey, Senior Procurement Officer
Telephone: (343) 550-4936
Email: Daniel.caughey@rcmp-grc-gc.ca

**Documents:**
The tender documents can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24511/202400248-acan-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24511/202400248-acan_en.pdf)(English) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24511/202400248-acan-_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24511/202400248-acan-fr.pdf) (French)

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
World

**Regions of Delivery:**
Canada
